title: Council Directive 72/427/EEC of 19 December 1972 amending the Council Directive of 26 July 1971 on the approximation of the laws of Member States relating to common provisions for both measuring instruments and methods of metrological control
header:
COUNCIL DIRECTIVE  of 19 December 1972  amending the Council Directive of 26 July 1971 on the approximation of the laws of Member States relating to common provisions for both measuring instruments and methods of metrological control  (72/427/EEC)
THE COUNCIL OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body: The drawings to which Annex II, item 3.2.1 of the Council Directive of 26 July 1971 refers, shall be supplemented by the letters necessary for the signs UK, IR and DK, in accordance with the model below: >PIC FILE= "T0010758">   1OJ No L 202, 6.9.1971, p. 1.
This Directive is addressed to the Member States and shall take effect on the date of accession.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 19 December 1972.
For the Council
The President
T. WESTERTERP
